attributes.action: Recognise working cond,in heavy industries and adj the pension age accordingly.
attributes.background: I’ve personally worked on various building sites and also been self employed & had my own business. I now work in the steel industry ( Heavy manual handling and shift work ) as I bet there’s plenty of other industries out there that match this profile that would also agree.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the state pension age for people who work in certain industries, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
